author: Ted
content:
You are right. This is epic. It is an explosive feeling Andreas which you have rendered in a way that ignites it - KA-BOOM!

Not a shabby neighborhood buddy. My window looks out on... on... well a wall ðŸ™‚ Ahhhhh... city living. And you overlook the ruins of a castle? I'm really happy for you. And for the way you've sent the feeling to me, here... in this explosive epic.
